headline: Stronger Q1 Results And Higher 2026 Sales Outlook Might Change The Case For Investing In Nordson (NDSN)
summary: In February 2026, Nordson Corporation reported first-quarter 2026 results showing sales of US$669.46 million and net income of US$133.38 million, with basic earnings per share from continuing operations of US$2.39, and raised its full-year 2026 sales outlook to a range of US$2.86 billion to US$2.98 billion. Alongside these results, Nordson increased near-term and full-year guidance while senior executives sold shares, moves that sharpen investor focus on the company’s earnings quality and...
